msbt.message: It's the Year of the Mouse! It's kinda weird having a whole year dedicated to you.Maybe I oughta do a speech!<10_4 /> Folks, friends, ers, a huh huh, lend me your snacks!

Do you know what kinda year it is? It's MY year! The Year of the Bull!I'm not gonna let it go to my head, buuut, it's pretty cool! PrettyMOOoooool. Eh? A huh huh!Alright, that was a dumb joke. I sorta almost feel bad about that one.
It's the Year of Me! The Tiger! I'm gonna become a leader that everyone can depend on!I'm gonna let everybody know about the best snacks and the best places for naps!
It's the Year of the Rabbit! I probably oughta clean my ears, huh?
Hey, didja know it's the Year of the Horse? I hope nobody's expecting a speech or anything.
It's the Year of the Sheep! That's me! This is my year! Happy Me Year!
It's the Year of the Monkey! I'm so happy, I could climb a tree!I'm not going to climb a tree, though. That is just It's way too much work to show folks I'm happy.

Hey, . Guess what kinda year it is! I'll give you a hintâ€”I'M the hint!It's the Year, yeah, the Year The Year of the Bird! A huh huh huh!It's crazy having a year just for you.If they ever get around to doing a "Year of the ," you're gonna love it!

I've waited a LONG TIME for this, butit's finally the Year of the Dog!The Year of the Dog only happens once every 12 years! Wow. 12 years ago? This island didn't even exist!Hang on. Have I said that before? About the island being here 12 years ago? Seems familiarbut maybe not!Man, this kinda thing is why I quit time traveling!
It's the Year of the Pig! I feel like this year's gonna be a real good year for me, !Look! My tail is all perkier and curlier than usual! It looks so happy!
